title: Blendo
description:
Blendo is a Conversational AI assistant that integrates with Salesforce, Slack, Confluence, Zoom,Snowflake and internal data sources etc. 

Some of the common use cases are - Answer client queries and map requirements to features like "Is Client X compliant with security regulations?", Auto-update CRM records like "Update CRM MEDDIC fields based on my last meeting", AI-driven pipeline insights and forecasting like "List opportunities at risk due to 'X' pain point." & many more.

Visit blendo.ai
